sentences.sentence: We have three types of fish, and we randomise the speed of their animation using the Time node.
sentences.translation: 我们有三种类型的鱼，我们使用时间节点随机化它们的动画的速度。

sentences.sentence: Slice it Up slices your footage into any number of slices and gives you full control over its position and rotation with the ability to re-randomise existing data.
sentences.translation: 输入任意切片数量，脚本就可以快速为你的图层添加位置、旋转等可控制参数。
